verb.definition: To provide or use a voucher (informal/constructed usage)
verb.example: They vouchered the discount at the checkout counter.

noun.definition: A small printed piece of paper that entitles the holder to a discount, exchange, or payment
noun.example: She used a voucher to get 20% off her purchase.

usage_examples: He redeemed the meal voucher before it expired.
Many stores accept digital vouchers as well as printed ones.
